questions.question: What's been exciting or interesting in what you've been learning or doing lately?
questions.potentialInsight: Recent focus areas, intrinsic motivation, current engagement level

questions.question: What led you to explore the field or direction you're in right now?
questions.potentialInsight: Career journey, curiosity triggers, origin story

questions.question: What's something you'd like to learn more about or try in the near future?
questions.potentialInsight: Aspirations, near-term goals, personal definition of progress

questions.question: What gives you energy in your current work?
What kind of projects make you lose track of time?
Can you tell me about a moment recently when you felt proud of your work?
What kind of teamwork or collaboration makes you feel at your best?
What kind of environment helps you do your best work or feel most like yourself?
How do you recharge after a demanding day or week?
What do people usually come to you for?
What's something that feels effortless for you, even when it's challenging for others?
Which recent challenge made you feel you were 'at your best'?
If you could shape your next role freely, what would it include?
What's something new you'd like to learn or take on next?
Looking a few years ahead, what kind of problems or causes would you love to be part of?
What matters most to you in the way you work?
When you think about taking on something new, what helps you decide if it's worth your time and energy?
When you think about meaningful work, what comes to mind?
What kind of situations make work harder than it should be?
What kind of situations or setups drain your energy?
What would make it easier for you to take your next step?
How do you like to support or guide others?
When your team is making decisions, what's your natural way of contributing?
